sub_title: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics
summary:
Passionate real estate and workplace strategy expert dedicated to creating high quality, healthy and sustainable projects. 

I believe in a data-driven approach to creating human-centered workplaces and have experienced first hand how healthy, sustainable buildings deliver measurably higher value and performance to companies.

I have realized numerous sustainable real estate projects for the circular economy through the use of the Cradle to Cradle methodology.

Myers-Briggs ENTP - Energized by projects that cause the left-brain and right-brain to collaborate - Life-long learner - Outgoing and social - I value ideas and opinions different from mine.

Dedicated family man, active community member, lover of music and life-long lacrosse fanatic.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

education.degree_name: MScSM Master of Science in Strategic Management

projects.title: Ambachtsezoom Industrial Zone Area Development
projects.description:
Industrial Parks are a major contributor not only to the economic engine of the Netherlands but also greenhouse gas emissions. The municipality of Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht (H-I-A) in South Holland contracted Zachariasse Consulting (Z|C) as its principle Circular Development Advisor. In this responsibility Z|C lead the vision, mission and conceptual development of the Netherlands first Industry Park for the Circular Economy. Z|C lead the training, education and coaching program project teams and collaborated with H-I-A for the integration of sustainability characteristics within the zoning plan. Z|C presented the plan to the Public Steering Committee and received unanimous approval from all political parties in H-I-A. As a result Z|C was named as lead strategic advisor to the Municipal Political Board of Economics and Sustainability for Ambachtsezoom including assistance with positioning / communications and further identification of projects within the Rotterdam Metropolitan Area. Z|C served as the team coordinator facilitating and co-managing with H-I-A the various project teams for the master plan area development and contributed to the re-design of the project master plan for optimisation of open spaces and ecological zones. Z|C also served as the primary engagement party for real estate developers to engage on aspects of sustainability and circular economy.  

The project is currently still ongoing

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Park 20|20 Area Development and Office Park
projects.description:
Size: 3.5 hectare, 92,000 m2 | 990,280 sq. ft of built space
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

Park 20|20 is the worlds first full-service Cradle to Cradle inspired office park and is a commercially successful, global showcase of ground-breaking sustainability and health, wellbeing & productivity in offices environments. Centralised clean energy production & water filtration embedded within a park setting of local flora that serves as food-sources, breeding grounds and safe habitats for a variety of local and migrating fauna the park is not an exercise in landscaping but an integral part of the development. 

In capacities first as Sustainability Officer for Delta Development Group and then as head of Innovation and Sustainability while serving as a private contractor responsibilities include:  tenant engagement & attraction, strategic integration & execution of sustainability into designs of the common spaces and all structures, design & execution of integrated supply chains to leverage knowledge from manufacturers, education, training and coaching of teams of project managers, contractors and subcontractors, project concept development, marketing, branding and communications, design, development and management of the Park 20|20 R&D and Innovation Program to create practical solutions from data and information generated by universities and private research firms. Target setting & management of BREEAM-NL certification, water filtration, energy production and Cradle to Cradle materialisation and biodiversity enhancement.

Project Success:  
•	Biggest collection of Cradle to Cradle Certified ™ material worldwide
•	The Park 2020 Masterplan has received an Honor Award from the American Society of Landscape Architects (ASLA)
•	Winner SHARE Award 2012
•	Consistent user satisfaction> 95%
•	High Leesman Scores of buildings measured  (Leesman average = 60,4)
•	BSH = 69,3
•	Delta / Technical Pavilion = 78.2

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Valley
projects.description:
Size: 15 hectare
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

Vally is a low-density mixed-use area development that will serve as the Netherlands national showcase for business and built environment circularity. The concept is a pre-competitive environment where companies are able to lease a wide variety working areas both open and private for the design, development and enhancement of business models and practices that will stimulate a transition from a linear (take, make, waste) production process to a circular model that will capture resource leakage at the beginning and end of a products lifetime. As an independent consultant providing innovation and sustainability advice for Delta Development Group and SADC my function was to design the Valley Principles as a set of common values that organisations would adopt when locating at Valley. Additional responsibilities include, training, education and coaching for engaged teams and stakeholders on Circular Economy and Cradle to Cradle, collaboration with area and structural design teams for the production of the project masterplan and phase 1. 

Project has achieved permits for construction and is currently in talks with tenants to occupy phase 1.

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Luxembourg Automotive Cluster Area Development Masterplan
projects.description:
Size: 14 hectare
Location: Roost, commune of Bissen, Luxembourg

The Grand Duchy of Luxembourg is creating an Automotive Cluster for its innovative and forward thinking automotive industry activities near Roost in the commune of Bissen. Z|C was contracted by the Luxembourg Ministry of the Economy as the projects Circular Economy advisor for the concept and project initiation phase. Z|C's  activities included: service as primary consultant to the Luxembourg Ministry of the Economy for the concept and masterplan development for the entire site. Lead advisor to the city of Luxembourg for the design and development of the communal facilities hub for the campus. Lead advisor for the human-centered and health/wellness developments for the anticipated 4,000 employees at the Luxembourg Automotive Campus.

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Plantronics European HQ
projects.description:
Size: 3,500 m2 / 37,674 sq. ft 
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

The European headquarters of Plantronics, producers of professional communication apparatus. As described in the 2018 German Design Awards, the building showcases how the right mix of acoustic expertise, technology and biophilic design can result in improved employee collaboration and productivity. The building accommodates various employee work styles, without the distractions typically found in an open office. The materials used are 100 % recyclable and have been processed and produced in a sustainable and eco-friendly manner. Cherry Tree Consultancy provided execution advice and consultation related to interior design for optimal productivity and employee effectiveness, BREEAM-NL Certification, Leesman Certification, Project Management of University research reports, Sustainable design (core & shell + interior) and supply chain design and optimisation. Additionally designed and facilitated concept and design workshops for: project vision & values, human performance & productivity, Activity Based Working and Cradle to Cradle design. 

Project Success:
•	Global showcase for Plantronics for their 'smarter working' concept positive impact on employee productivity and workplace effectiveness
•	The building has been awarded the Connell Soundscape Award, due to the practical and innovative solutions to reduce noise on the work floor.
•	Leesman+ Certification Lmi rating of 82.3 (3rd highest score in Europe & top 3% world wide)
Winner German Design Award 2018 - Excellent Communications Design
Interior Architecture
•	Nominated by Jones Lang LaSalle Winning Workplace
•	Highest Cradle to Cradle level of quality reached in Europe (at moment of delivery)
•	BREEAM-NL Excellent rating

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Bluewater Energy Services
projects.description:
Size 9,100 m2 | 97,952 sq. ft
Location Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

Global HQ for Bluewater Energy Services. Cherry Tree Consulting provided conceptual, design and strategic execution (including supply chain process design and optimisation) advice for the projects sustainability and human centred design features including Cradle to Cradle materialisation and project management of the creation of the material passport. Further activities included client management and team training and education, consultation on BREEAM-NL Certification, Energy management and project materialisation including a unique 100% design for disassembly facade system constructed by Cradle to Cradle Silver Certified Royal Mosa Tiles.

Project Success:
•	Consistent user satisfaction after 1 year> 95%
•	At the time of delivery, the largest collection of C2C certified materials worldwide in one building
•	BREEAM-NL Excellent
•	At time of delivery Bluewater represented the lowest cost per m2 at Park 20|20
•	Project delivered on-time and within budget
•	Innovative digital materials passport products registry linked to the BIM model

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Amstelveen Primary School
projects.description:
Size: 2,800 m2 | 30,139 sq. ft
Location: Amstelveen, the Netherlands

The Amstelveen “Brede School” project, was a commission from the municipality of Amstelveen for the design and construction of a new, healthy, energy positive school to replace the current outdated facilities of three current elementary schools. Zachariasse Consulting partnered with William McDonough + Partners, to design a Cradle to Cradle® inspired school. The project was designed to create an energy positive, healthy school that reaches out to its surroundings by creating a cohesion and connectivity with the general community by thoroughly implementing the concept of urban farming. Central to the design was enhancement of education through creating an inspiring and healthy learning environment for its students and teachers.

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Woonbedrijf Eindhoven (public housing corporation)
projects.description:
Size: 80,000 housing units
Location: Eindhoven, the Netherlands

Woonbedrijf Eindhoven is a semi-public housing corporation located within the Netherlands city of Eindhoven with a portfolio of 80,000 homes. Zachariasse Consulting (Z|C) was contracted as a Circularity coach and advisor to identify opportunities within the organisational structure and portfolio to realise savings and create value. Z|C designed and executed a resource analysis that collected data on materials for the five largest product assortment within Woonbedrijf's portfolio. Data on amount, location, ease of access/recovery and market value (per kilogram) identified a potential value creation of €46,978,738 (US $64,208,794) and created a integrated production strategy that could, through a 5 year roll-out period, realise 18% in annual cost reduction attributed to their their new-build, re-development and demolition processes. Annual activities at that time amounted to €300 M + (US $410 M +).

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: FIFPro House - International HQ for Professional Football Players Association
projects.description:
Size: 2,680 m2 | 28,847 sq. ft
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

Global HQ for the Federation of International Football Players. As per the project description on Delta Development's Website, "With their building, FIFPro is making a strong and powerful statement to its employees and visitors. The rich application of glass reflects the transparency of the organisation and emphasises the interior and high quality materials for human safety and health."

Project Success:
•	BREEAM-NL Excellent
•	Annual reduction of water consumption from 175 litre per m2 (compared to a standard sustainable building in the Netherlands)
•	14% decrease in energy consumption (compared to a standard sustainable building in the Netherlands)
•	The design of the striking flower pattern carpet is inspired by a wild flower meadow which surrounded the building whilst it was under construction.
•	 User satisfaction in the last 3 years > 95%
•	The choice of healthy materials for healthy employees throughout the building with specific focus on eliminating toxicity from all materials including glues/adhesives, paints and coatings

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Biological Nutrients Pavilion at Park 20|20
projects.description:
Size: 725 m2 | 7,804 sq. ft

As a showcase of natural materials the Biological Pavilion at Park 20|20 with its cross-laminated timber construction, green-roof and optimisation of natural light and ventilation is a project that brings to life biophilic construction to provide an intimate connection between people and the natural environment. Its restaurant is farm-to-table concept is realised through connection with an on-site organic farm that provides jobs for people who traditionally experience distance engaging within the labor market. Cherry Tree Consultancy provided consultation to vision and concept development, sustainable design and development, supply chain design and optimisation and communications.

Project Success:
•	Boasts numerous Cradle to Cradle Certified Products that were introduced via the project to the Dutch construction market
•	Bio-gas installation provides renewable energy from the WC facilities in the restaurant
•	Fully operational farm provides jobs to 10+ persons who have experienced difficulty in distance to the traditional labor market

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: Technical Nutrients Pavilion at Park 20|20
projects.description:
Size: 400 m2 | 4,306 sq. ft
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

The Experience Centre doubles as the head office of Delta Development Group and serves as a meeting space or conference room where knowledge in the field of Cradle to Cradle and sustainability can be shared. Cherry Tree Consultancy provided consultation to vision and concept development, sustainable design and development, renewable energy and water system development, supply chain design and optimisation and communications.

Project Success:
•	All materials can be upcycled back into the technical circle at the end of their lifecycle at Park 20|20.
•	The building serves as a showcase for both Park 20|20's 'design to disassemble' strategy and the current state of affairs in the field of technical Cradle to Cradle Certified building materials.
•	Circular business cases are implemented for lighting and office furniture
•	Clean energy for heating and cooling supplied by a central Thermal energy storage (WKO).
•	Optimal onsite orientation and design maximises solar gain to the PV panels and natural daylight

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: ANWB Travel
projects.description:
Size: 4,250 m2 | 45,747 sq. ft
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

ANWB is the Netherlands equivalent of the USA AAA and as a separate business unit operates a number of foreign travel agencies which are all headquartered in the ANWB Travel building at Park 20|20. Human centered design and sustainability characteristics inspired by the Cradle to Cradle design principles are featured in visible and relatable ways directly engaging and supporting to occupants. In capacity first as Sustainability Officer for Delta Development Group and then as a private contractor in charge of Innovation and Sustainability at Park 20|20 my responsibilities included training and educating the project teams on Cradle to Cradle design and construction practices, sourcing healthy, non-toxic material, translation of human centered design principles to interior turn-key offices and internal, external performance tracking and reporting. 

Project Success:
•	BREEAM Excellent
•	Energy Level A 100% of cooling and 75% of heating supplied by clean renewable sources of energy
•	Highest collection of Cradle to Cradle Certified Materials of any project at Park 20|20 at date of delivery
•	User satisfaction rating of > 95% 
•	Delivery within schedule and budget
•	Rent levels 30% higher than market norm

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

projects.title: B/S/H/ House Hold Appliances
projects.description:
Size: 8,600 m2 | 92,570 sq. ft
Location: Hoofddorp, the Netherlands (Amsterdam Metropolitan Area)

Bosch Siemens House Hold Appliances (B/S/H/) is the Netherlands HQ and showcase area for global brands such as Bosch, Siemens, Gaggenau, NEFF and Solitaire. The building is a corporate statement that underlines values such as innovation, aesthetics and sustainability. In capacity as Sustainability Officer at Delta Development Group my responsibilities were to educate and train development team on Cradle to Cradle design and materials, collaborate with design teams on material scans and assessments for health, circularity, water, energy and social impact, supply chain engagement for Cradle to Cradle Certified materials and communications. 

Project Success:
•	BREEAM Very Good
•	Among other things, the building’s layout promotes connectivity between the employees and this has led to a reduction of internal email by 26%.
•	User satisfaction> 95% in the last 3 years
•	Increase in spontaneous job applications is 126%
•	14% decrease in energy use (compared to the average sustainable buildings in the Netherlands)
•	On completion the BSH building was the building with the largest collection of C2C certified materials in Europe.

contributors.headline: Senior Director JLL Consulting | Shaping the Future of Real Estate | Regional Lead Netherlands & Nordics

profile_positions.description:
Within JLL Consulting the Place Practice focuses on the built environment and how it needs to adapt to support digital transformation, demographic shifts and new ways of working. JLL's Place Practice provides portfolio strategy, workplace strategy, location strategy, placemaking & urban regeneration, flex strategy, financial management and capital strategies, sourcing strategy and PropTech strategy.

As the Netherlands and Nordics Regional Lead I guide all aspects related to the development and delivery of Place Practice Consulting services within the region. As a member of the EMEA Consulting Leadership Team I work with the leaders of our other JLL Consulting practices to ensure our clients receive the highest quality advice and service in EMEA and across the globe.
profile_positions.title: JLL Global Consulting, Place Practice Geo Lead | Netherlands and Nordics

profile_positions.description: Within the Netherlands JLL Work Dynamics business I lead Strategic Consulting services related to workplace strategy, change management, smart workplaces and sustainability. For select corporate clients my team executes across the EMEA region.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director JLL Work Dynamics: Workplace & Change Management | Sustainability | Smart Workplaces

profile_positions.description: In this role I am responsible for the development and delivery workplace strategy, change management services in the Netherlands. For select corporate clients my team provides coverage across the EMEA region.
profile_positions.title: Director JLL Work Dynamics - Workplace Strategy | Change Management

profile_positions.description: Principal Partner and co-founder of a real estate development consulting agency specializing in strategy and execution for highly sustainable commercial properties and area developments. Areas of focus include: Circular Economy, Cradle to Cradle Design and ESG's.

company.name: Cradle to Cradle Products Innovation Institute

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Cradle to Cradle Products Innovation Institute, a non-profit organization, educates and empowers manufacturers of consumer products to become a positive force for society and the environment, helping to bring about a new industrial revolution. 

The Institute administers the publicly available Cradle to Cradle Certified™ Product Standard which provides designers and manufacturers with criteria and requirements for continually improving what products are made of and how they are made.

The Cradle to Cradle Certified™ mark provides consumers, regulators, employees, and industry peers with a clear, visible, and tangible validation of a manufacturer’s ongoing commitment to sustainability and to their communities.

volunteer_experiences.role: Advisory Council, New Build and Renovation
volunteer_experiences.description: The Dutch Green Building Council is an independent group that aims to make urban environments sustainable. The Dutch Green Building Council develops and issues the internationally renowned BREEAM-NL certificate. This certificate is the  foremost index to compare buildings, projects, and land on the of basis of sustainability in The Netherlands. The Dutch Green Building Council trains professionals to make assessments and implement new sustainable measures.

The NAF is the leading bilateral foundation
promoting high-impact exchanges
between the Netherlands and the United States.
Designed and ran all practices in the Netherlands as players prepared for international competition. Assistant coach at the 2012 European Championships in Amsterdam

Board member for the Nederlands Lacrosse Bond. Expand and manage the sport of lacrosse in the Netherlands including the Mens Dutch National Lacrosse League and the Mens National Lacrosse Team. Developed and implemented the oversight and independent governance program and oversaw the Mens National Team's European Championship campaign in Lathi, Finland which resulted in a Silver Medal finish.

skills: Health, wellbeing, productivity in real estate
